code: import'./app-filter.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AppFilter=function AppFilter(props){var buttonsData=[{name:'all',label:'All employees'},{name:'rise',label:'For promotion'},{name:'moreThen1000',label:'Salary more than 1000$'}];var buttons=buttonsData.map(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name,label=_ref.label;var active=props.filter===name;var clazz=active?'btn-light':'btn-outline-light';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn ".concat(clazz),type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onFilterSelect(name);},children:label},name);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn-group",children:buttons});};export default AppFilter;
